backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and service requests with access control, status tracking, notes, and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change to the controller platform select and listing affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, layout, and admin guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Manages viewing and adding public or internal notes on a request, including form inputs and notes list rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with login or home navigation options depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status and showing loading or access denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout using Internet Identity and displays button states with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter name and optional email, saving the profile on submit.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Reusable styled card wrapper component using Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Form field wrapper providing label, error, helper text, and layout consistency.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section displaying categorized service lists with prices using BrandCard and catalog utilities.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Timeline component rendering sorted status history with icons, timestamps, and current status highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Renders grouped service checkboxes and handles selection updates for repairs, customization, and performance services.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer sections with service lists, links, and attribution including dynamic year and hostname-based tracking link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides site navigation with desktop and mobile menus, login button, pricing scroll behavior, and admin link handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages client-side image files with preview URLs, supporting add, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating service requests via the backend actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Contains a static service catalog with pricing plus helpers to filter services, format prices, and calculate totals.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps backend RequestStatus values to human-readable labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin page showing full request details with status and price editing, notes, and timeline.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin list view for all service requests with status filtering and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, service previews, and scroll handling for pricing navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Displays a confirmation message and request ID after submitting a service request.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Provides a form to create a service request with validation, image handling, and submission via backend.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Customer page to search a service request by ID and display its details and status timeline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for the controller platform selector update.
